text.hammer.welcome_0: §r§7Some of your settings have been changed to improve the recording - you may change them in §6Chat Settings§r§7!
text.hammer.welcome_4: §r§7Have fun and ask §bvini2003§r§7#§r§d0875§r§7 or §bCubxity§r§7#§r§d7801§r§7 if you require help!
